/*programmed by dipjal */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#define pb push_back
#define sz(c) c.size()
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;



static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;

    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(int x)
{
    char s[7];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}



int main()
{
    //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    //cin.tie(0);
    int n,num;
    int length;
    vi V;
    vi::iterator it;
    n=scan1();
    //scanf("%d",&n);
    V.pb(-1);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        num=scan1();
        //scanf("%d",&num);
        it=lower_bound(V.begin(),V.end(),num);
        if(it==V.end())
        {
            V.pb(num);
        }
        else
        {
            V.at(it-V.begin())=num;

        }


    }
    int ans=sz(V)-1;
    WriteInt(ans);
    return 0;
}
